comment.author: 25834641@N00
comment._content: Interesting that J.J. rescued people with the Noma, while he himself died on the Titanic.

comment.author: 10771167@N00
comment._content: Regarding the date, obviously, it must have been shot before April 14th 1912.

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: puzzlemaster: Thanks for pointing this out. We can probably date the photo even earlier, since J.J. Astor and Madeleine Talmage Force were married on Sept. 9, 1911.  We'll fix the date  in the source data and reload the description.
